attributes.action: Tell snapchat to bring back the old update
attributes.additional_details: Victims have told me their phone dies within a minute
attributes.background: Snapchat was widely liked for its unique structure however recently in their new update they have destroyed it! Viewing, snapping is practically a myth, in fact it’s even damaging peoples phones

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for Snapchat.

You can find out more about the role of the UK Government and Parliament here: 

http://www.parliament.uk/education/about-your-parliament/what-parliament-does/

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
